Class PrivateMessageConvoPage

java.lang.Object
application.framework.BasePage
application.pages.PrivateMessageConvoPage
public class PrivateMessageConvoPage extends BasePage
Represents the private message conversation page. This page allows users to view and reply to private messages.
Author:
Mike

      private String getConversation(PrivateMessage pm)
      Retrieves the entire conversation thread of a private message.

      Returns:

      Sends a reply to a private message.
